synonyms.synonym: Ubiquinol-cytochrome-c reductase complex cytochrome c1 subunit

protein.specific_function: This is the heme-containing component of the cytochrome b-c1 complex, which accepts electrons from Rieske protein and transfers electrons to cytochrome c in the mitochondrial respiratory chain

reference.reference_text: Nishikimi M, Ohta S, Suzuki H, Tanaka T, Kikkawa F, Tanaka M, Kagawa Y, Ozawa T: Nucleotide sequence of a cDNA encoding the precursor to human cytochrome c1. Nucleic Acids Res. 1988 Apr 25;16(8):3577.
Suzuki H, Hosokawa Y, Nishikimi M, Ozawa T: Structural organization of the human mitochondrial cytochrome c1 gene. J Biol Chem. 1989 Jan 25;264(3):1368-74.
